blogposts.title: They always come with a side of skinny blond
blogposts.author: By Viola Josephine Hestbech
blogposts.intro:
Dear diary,
I went to work today and whilst lashing lattes, both steamed and on ice, over the counter, I locked eyes with a greek adonis looking fella. Now, this is supposed to be my hot girl summer (in a "I'm hot and gon do me, even though I got rolls and thighs that love/hate each other on the daily"- kind of way), and I was not gonna let this dude get away without my contact information, cause what wasn't hidden by the mask was looking cuuuute. I started giving him some of my grade A flirting and he goddamn flirted back, all while I was brewing his coffee!!! He took his large triple-shot cappuccino and sat down. I stood and contemplated how I was gonna inform him of his gorgeous looks, as well as my facebook URL for a minute and then told my colleages that I would just clean the cafe area, as I felt it had suddenly become very much a mess and in need of my attendance. But when i turned around the corner and entered the cafe, I saw him, his girlfriend and her very pregnant belly. And it made me wonder... Why do the good ones always come with a side of skinny blonde?

blogposts.title: They always come with a side of skinny blond
